p: Essential oil shows good efficacy against aureus bacteria, which are among the most common pathogens encountered in clinical practices, and they are a major cause of hospital infection, food poisoning, osteomyelitis, endocarditis, toxic shock syndrome, and a wide range of other disorders. It is effective against the bacteria Escherichia coli, which is widespread in spoiled foods, causing intestinal disturbances and severe diarrhea. This oil showed statistically significant efficacy against Escherichia coli, while Amoxycyclin had the opposite effect ( Table 13).
